title: The Neural Tap
description: The Harbinger failed to upload itself, but it managed to back-hack the Academic Quarter's server farms. Scholars are going mad, drawing complex bio-mechanical blueprints in their own blood.

turns.narrative: The Server-Farm is on lockdown. Mad scholars are furiously maintaining a massive receiver dish cobbled together from server parts and bone.
turns.consequence_a: It takes immense effort and precision. You manage to knock them out, but a massive construct of wire and flesh drops from the ceiling.
turns.choice_b: Kill the scholars to secure the room quickly
turns.consequence_b: You clear the room brutally. The construct drops down to fight you, but lacks the cultists to heal it.

turns.narrative: The Whisperer Construct is made of screaming server racks grafted with human lungs. It emits sonic attacks that shatter magic wards.
turns.consequence_a: You smash the racks, reducing its health but leaving its horrific bio-weapons intact.
turns.consequence_b: You melt away the lungs. The construct loses its sonic attacks, making the fight an easy brawl.

scholars_saved.description: You defeated the construct without executing the scholars.

scholars_killed.description: You cleared the room, leaving the Academic Quarter mourning their loss.

conclusion: You defeated the construct without executing the scholars.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
